post:
Hello LET community,

Here is our "**New Year Special**". These are OpenVZ/SolusVM and will be provisioned in Phoenix, AZ at PhoenixNAP.

**VPS TWO Plan**

**256MB** Guaranteed/384MB Burstable RAM
15GB Storage
400GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
$4/month with PROMO CODE "SS2NEWYEAR"

**VPS THREE Plan**

**512MB** Guaranteed/768MB Burstable RAM
25GB Storage
500GB Transfer
Free Instant Setup
$6/month with PROMO CODE "SS3NEWYEAR"

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us. 

Thanks!
